head.title: Two Seminars to Aid Business Start-Ups

hedline.hl1: Two Seminars to Aid Business Start-Ups

abstract.p: Small Business Administration and Service Corps of Retired Executives schedule free seminars in White Plains and Katonah, NY, for potential business owners (S)

block.p: Arranging financing will be one of the topics at free seminars for potential business owners on Oct. 25 from 6 to 8 p.m. at the White Plains Library and on Oct. 28 from 10 a.m. to noon at the Katonah Village Library.

The programs are sponsored by the Small Business Administration and the Service Corps of Retired Executives and will feature business experts who will speak on a variety of topics pertaining to business start-ups.

Arranging financing will be one of the topics at free seminars for potential business owners on Oct. 25 from 6 to 8 p.m. at the White Plains Library and on Oct. 28 from 10 a.m. to noon at the Katonah Village Library.

The programs are sponsored by the Small Business Administration and the Service Corps of Retired Executives and will feature business experts who will speak on a variety of topics pertaining to business start-ups.
Those wishing to attend the White Plains seminar can pre-register by calling the Score office at (914) 948-3907. No preregistration is required for the Katonah seminar.
